pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, May 16, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Paris, France

8:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of New Zealand, Jacinda Ardern.

Canadian Official Residence
135, rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the VivaTech event, and deliver a keynote speech.

Paris Expo Porte de Versailles
1, Place de la Porte de Versailles

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a luncheon hosted by the President of France, Emmanuel Macron.

Palais de l’Élysée
55, rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the founder of Wikipedia, Jimmy Wales.

Canadian Official Residence
135, rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Embassy of Canada
130, rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
